Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game

Class ShapeUpGame

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.AbstractShapeUpGame
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.ShapeUpGame
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule
public class ShapeUpGame
extends AbstractShapeUpGame
Represents the normal mode of the game. It extends AbstractShapeUpGame to follow the game's construction.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShapeUpGame

      public ShapeUpGame​(IBoardVisitor visitor, java.util.List<Player> players, AbstractBoard board)
      Game's constructor. Sets up parameters.
      Parameters:
      visitor - the game's visitor. Used to calculate the score.
      players - the player's list. The list can contain 2 or 3 players.
      board - the game's board. It can be a rectangular, triangular or circular board.

  • Method Details

    • initRound

      public void initRound()
      Initiates a round. In the normal mode, we set victory cards at the start of the round.
      Overrides:
      initRound in class AbstractShapeUpGame

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn() throws PlayerHandEmptyException, BoardEmptyException
      Makes play one turn to the current player.
      Specified by:

      Throws:
      PlayerHandEmptyException
      BoardEmptyException

    • isRoundFinished

      public boolean isRoundFinished()
      Allows to know if the round is finished or not. A round is finished when the deck is empty and all players' hands are empty too.
      Specified by:
      isRoundFinished in class AbstractShapeUpGame
